channel.title: blogging on rubot
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on rubot

item.title: Experiments with Blogging Platforms
item.description:
When I first decided to blog, I investigated a few platforms. I wanted something that allowed me to

  • Create posts easily
  • Flexibility with theme and other advanced features
  • Low cost/Free

item.title: Hello World Reboot
item.description: It’s been about 4 years since I last blogged, stuff has got in the way and I have just not been bothered. Anyway this year I want to start blogging again – a hello world reboot ;).
